episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Local Voices & Digital Equity
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Local Voices & Digital Equity.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [CFJC Today Kamloops] CFJC Midday – The month of love is here! Valentine’s gift ideas at Tumbleweed Toys are plentiful, and some new products have hit the shelves and [CFJC Today Kamloops] CFJC Midday – February at the Paramount Theatre showcases some classics and much anticipated films! Catch Hamnet, Man on the Run and a special Valentine’s Day screening of The Princess Bride, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into local voices & digital equity, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
